name: Tunche: Arena
description: Try the challenging Arena mode, a free standalone version of an upcoming hand-drawn beat’em up adventure Tunche, a glorious return of classic 2D beat'em up gameplay mixed with roguelike elements, hand-drawn 2D style and witchcraft.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel Core2 Duo E8400, 3.0GHz or AMD Athlon 64 X2 6000+, 3.0GHz or higher Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Geforce 9600 GT or AMD HD 3870 512MB or higher Storage: 4 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX®-compatible
